content: We’re giving away a friends and family cinema pass with all devices on selected tariffs, to get you up to 40% off cinema tickets. Claim yours when you buy any Pay Monthly phone or tablet on a 15GB+ tariff, or any dongle on an 18GB+ tariff. It’s valid for 24 months and you can use it on 2D screenings at cinemas across the UK. You’ll get a redemption scratch card with your order – just follow the instructions to claim your pass. Offer ends 7 November and you’ll need to claim your discount pass by 5 December.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p a span
html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div h3 span
content: Phone plans as individual as you are

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
content: We're putting you in control of your phone plan. So you can choose how much you pay upfront, how much data you need, and how long you want to pay off your phone for. Choose anywhere between 3 and 36 months – the total cost of your device will be the same. Changed your mind? No problem. You can flex your data allowance up and down, once a month. And if you fancy upgrading, just pay off your Device Plan at any time and choose a new phone.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p a span
html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div h3 span
content: Turn heads with the infinity display

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
content: The Galaxy S8 is like nothing you’ve ever seen before. Its stunning, borderless infinity display not only turns heads, but lets you see more and scroll less. Its glass and metal design makes it look all the more elegant. And it’s rated IP68 for water and dust resistance. So you can take calls in the rain or browse your social media on the beach, without the worry.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div h3 span
content: Take stunning pictures in low light

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
content: With a 12MP main camera and 8MP front-facing camera, you can capture the moment from any angle. And you can say goodbye to blurry selfies on a night out. The Galaxy S8 features low-light image processing, so you’ll be able to take quality snaps in any light. The main camera even autofocusses on faces, so you can re-live the moments that made you smile.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div h3 span
content: Get the information you need, with Bixby

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
content: With your own personal assistant and info services through Bixby Vision, the Galaxy S8's one-stop dashboard makes it easy to do what you want, when you want. At launch, Bixby will be available on all Samsung Galaxy S8 phones, and its voice function is coming soon to the UK.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div h3 span
content: Unlock the screen just by looking at it

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
content: Iris scanning technology means that you can unlock your screen just by looking at it. And because it only unlocks when it recognises your iris, it’s up to 200 times more secure than fingerprint technology. So you can be sure that all the data on your phone will be for your eyes only.

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div h3 span
content: Hear your music how it should be heard

tag: html body div div div div div div div div div div div div div ul li div div div p span
content: The Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus come with AKG earphones. They fit your ears perfectly, and feature the most balanced and authentic sound available in earphones. So wherever you take your phone, you'll be able to listen to your favourite bands as if you were in the front row.

content: Direct purchases only. Pay cash price or use a Device Plan. With your Device Plan, spread the cost over 3 to 36 months (excludes dongles). Total cost of your Device will not alter however long you choose. Minimum upfront cost applies and may vary with device. If you use a Device Plan you must also have a monthly rolling Airtime Plan for the length of your Device Plan. Pay off your Device Plan at any time without charge. You can then stay on airtime, upgrade, or leave.

content: Only had this phone for a short while. And so far I am liking it. Didn't realise it was an edge model as standard, but got used to some of the features and found them very useful. However, I love to protect my devices with covers and currently, if I want a cover to incorporate the edge facilities, it is lightweight and worries me about how secure the phone is. Please, as you are bringing further models out with edge screens can you provide affordable cases that are as sturdy as the ones on the market that incorporate the edge facilities too. Many thanks.
